translations: n.保留；预定（reservation 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: All telephone reservations must be confirmed in writing.
sentences.translation: 所有的电话预订必须以书面形式确认。

sentences.sentence: It is illegal to dishonour reservations; that goes for restaurants as well as customers.
sentences.translation: 不履行预订是违法的；这既适用于顾客，也适用于饭店。

sentences.sentence: If you wish to go away for the weekend, our office will be delighted to make hotel reservations.
sentences.translation: 如果您想在周末外出，我们的办事处将很高兴为您预定旅馆。
